text: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 is a foldable smartphone that was released in 2021. == Features == === Display === Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3 has a display when folded and display when unfolded. === Cameras === Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3 has three rear cameras: 12 MP, 12 MP and 12 MP. === Photos === File:Galaxy Z Fold3 5G.jpg File:Galaxy Z Fold3.jpg File:Galaxy Z Fold 3 5G.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 5G.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3.jpg File:Galaxy Z Fold.jpg File:Samsung Galaxy Z Fold.jpg == References == Z Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2021
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3
